DataElement.preferredName: First Greater Than or Equal To Platelet Count 50000 Recovery Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The month, day, and year the first platelet count greater than or equal to at least 50,000 per cubic millimeter occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: First Greater Than or Equal To Platelet Count 50000 Recovery Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._Indicates a platelet count of at least 50,000 per cubic millimeter._A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: First Greater Than or Equal To Platelet Count 50000 Recovery
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:Indicates a platelet count of at least 50,000 per cubic millimeter.:gradual healing (through rest) after sickness or injury.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
Indicates a platelet count of at least 50,000 per cubic millimeter.
A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury.

Property.preferredDefinition: Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ReferenceDocuments.description: PerformedObservation.dateRange WHERE PerformedObservation > DefinedObservation.nameCode = "perform platelet count" AND PerformedObservation > PerformedClinicalResult.value IS GREATER THAN OR EQUAL TO "50 x 10E9/L"
